external_references.description: Insikt Group. (2025, January 9). Chinese State-Sponsored RedDelta Targeted Taiwan, Mongolia, and Southeast Asia with Adapted PlugX Infection Chain. Retrieved January 14, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) used the GrimResource exploitation technique via specially crafted MSC files for arbitrary code execution during [RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0047).(Citation: Recorded Future RedDelta 2025)
